value: Status:  FAR Too Single, & Though not yet  Confident Enough to Start 'Actively Looking' ("Fixing things Up" from Gen. Pandemic Neglect, on Top of my Last Relationship: She TOTALLY Forfeited her "Emotional Deposit," lol!) I'd Welcome a Change!

name: Occupation:

name: Unbelievably REWARDING Day-Job:
value: Harm-Reduction Outreach Specialist," working w/ the 'Street Homeless' & 'Low-End Sex-Workers' — Basic "Street-Walkers" in 'Pre Juliani Days.'  The MOST Marginalized Demographics, & yet The Ones' in MOST need of both Services & 'Linkage-To-Care!'
